title: Understanding Feelings
caption: Know your emotions! Learn about different feelings and how to express them.
description: Feelings are like colors in your heart. Explore different emotions and discover ways to talk about and share them.
content:
Feelings are like colors in your heart. Here's what you need to know:

  • Learn the names of different emotions like happy, sad, angry, and excited
  • Understand that it's okay to feel all kinds of emotions
  • Talk to someone you trust about how you're feeling
  • Express your feelings through drawings, stories, or talking about them
  • Remember, everyone feels emotions, and it's important to share them!

By understanding feelings, you can paint a beautiful picture of your inner world.

quiz.question: What is important to do with your feelings?

title: Being Brave
caption: Embrace courage! Discover the power of bravery and facing your fears.
description: Being brave means standing tall even when you're scared. Learn how to overcome fear and be courageous.
content:
Being brave means standing tall even when you're scared. Here's how you can embrace courage:

  • Face your fears, one step at a time
  • Believe in yourself and your abilities
  • Ask for help when you need it
  • Take risks and try new things, even if they seem scary
  • Remember, bravery isn't the absence of fear, but the strength to face it!

By being brave, you unleash the superhero within you.

options.B: Standing tall even when you're scared

title: Spreading Kindness
caption: Explore the power of spreading love and kindness.
description: Kindness is like magic sprinkles that make the world a better place. Learn how small acts of kindness can create big smiles.
content:
Kindness is like magic sprinkles that make the world brighter. Here's how you can spread kindness:

  • Smile at someone who looks sad to cheer them up
  • Share your toys or snacks with friends to make them happy
  • Say kind words like 'thank you' and 'please' to show you care
  • Help someone who needs it, like picking up something they dropped
  • Remember, even small acts of kindness can make a big difference!

By spreading kindness, you become a superhero of the heart.

quiz.question: What can make the world a better place?

title: Feeling Grateful
caption: Count your blessings! Discover the joy of being thankful for the good things in life.
description: Gratitude is like a warm hug for your heart. Learn how to appreciate the little things and feel happier.
content:
Gratitude is like a warm hug for your heart. Here's how you can feel more grateful:

  • Think about three things you're thankful for every day
  • Say 'thank you' to people who help you or make you smile
  • Write a thank you note to someone special in your life
  • Look for the silver lining in challenging situations
  • Remember, there's always something to be grateful for!

By feeling grateful, you fill your heart with sunshine and rainbows.

quiz.question: What can help you feel happier?

options.C: Ignoring the good things in life

title: Mindfulness
caption: Explore the power of mindfulness and being in the moment.
description: Mindfulness is like a superpower that helps you stay calm and focused. Learn techniques to be mindful and enjoy the present.
content:
Mindfulness is like a superpower that helps you stay calm and focused. Here's how you can practice mindfulness:

  • Take deep breaths and focus on your breathing
  • Notice the sights, sounds, and sensations around you without judgment
  • Practice gratitude by appreciating the little things in life
  • Do activities mindfully, like eating or walking, paying attention to each moment
  • Remember, mindfulness helps you enjoy the present and reduce stress!

By practicing mindfulness, you become the master of your own mind.

quiz.question: What can help you stay calm and focused?

title: Bullying
caption: Stand up to bullying! Learn about bullying and how to prevent it.
description: Bullying is never okay. Discover what bullying is, how it affects others, and what you can do to stop it.
content:
Bullying is never okay. Here's what you need to know:

  • Understand that bullying is when someone hurts or scares another person on purpose
  • Know the different types of bullying, like physical, verbal, and cyberbullying
  • Speak up if you see someone being bullied or if you're being bullied yourself
  • Be a friend to someone who's being bullied and offer support
  • Remember, everyone deserves to feel safe and respected!

By standing up to bullying, you become a hero for kindness and respect.

quiz.question: What can you do if you see someone being bullied?

options.A: Join in and laugh at the person being bullied
